last_episode_to_air.name: Happy Ending
last_episode_to_air.overview: David stresses out over the rain on his wedding day, the family scrambles to make it right.

name: Schitt's Creek
overview: Formerly filthy rich video store magnate Johnny Rose, his soap star wife Moira, and their two kids, über-hipster son David and socialite daughter Alexis, suddenly find themselves broke and forced to live in Schitt's Creek, a small depressing town they once bought as a joke.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: When a filthy rich video store magnate Johnny Rose, his soap star wife Moira, and their two kids - über-hipster son David and socialite daughter Alexis - suddenly find themselves broke, they are forced to live in Schitt's Creek, a small, depressing town they once bought as a joke. With their pampered lives now abandoned, they must confront their new-found poverty and discover what it means to be a family, all within the rural city limits of their new home.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: After a failed attempt to sell the town, the once rich and powerful Rose family come to the depressing realization that their stay in Schitt's Creek may be longer than they originally hoped. Father and former video store magnate Johnny Rose continues to look for ways to extricate his family from life in their sad little town, while his wife Moira, a former soap star, searches for ways to grace the town with her sophistication and taste. As for their spoiled children, David and Alexis, they must do the unthinkable: find jobs. The Roses will bloom again -- even if it's in Schitt's Creek.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: As Season Three gets underway, the Rose family continues to ingratiate themselves into everyday life in Schitt’s Creek. Johnny has hit a brick wall in his quest to get the Roses out of Schitt’s Creek, and struggles to find a new project to give his life purpose – that is, until he finds one right under his nose. Moira adjusts to her new position on Town Council, learning the hard way that big ideas aren’t always compatible with small-town realities. David is riding high after meeting a new love interest at a party, but soon discovers that his romantic life is becoming entangled with Stevie’s. Meanwhile, Alexis contemplates her future, and decides to go back to school to complete her education. The Roses continue to adapt to everyday life in Schitt’s Creek, as their temporary sojourn begins to look more and more permanent with each passing day.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: As season four begins, the Roses are making the most of life in Schitt’s Creek, and —Moira’s constant talk of escaping aside— are finally starting to feel at home in the town. Johnny is busy running the motel with Stevie as his partner. Business is booming, but it’s a challenge for him to balance work and family, while dealing with Roland’s antics. Moira is carrying out her duties with Town Council and the Jazzagals, and is also looking for new ways to utilize her talents, whether it’s through a theatrical performance, or by helping Alexis navigate event planning. David is managing his store and attempting to maintain a brand new relationship, but between struggling to find the time for romance, and overcoming the anxieties of his dating past, this is proving to be a challenge. Meanwhile, Alexis is putting all of her energy into school and her career, but is finding it difficult to focus when she still has lingering feelings for her ex-fiancé, Ted.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: The Roses are finally thriving in Schitt’s Creek and find themselves ready to take their personal relationships and business pursuits to the next level. Moira returns from a breakthrough film shoot in Bosnia with a clear exit strategy and a renewed sense of purpose, and with that newfound energy, she is inspired to leave her mark on the town by launching her most ambitious artistic endeavor yet. Meanwhile, the reputation of the Rosebud Motel is steadily building under Johnny’s leadership, but managing the individual needs of his staff, Stevie and Roland, proves to be a greater challenge. With Rose Apothecary running smoothly, David is now focusing on nurturing his relationship with Patrick, and from apartment hunting to joining a baseball team, he proves he’s willing to go the extra mile. Alexis, having finally achieved some stability in both romance and career, isn’t one to let things get stale, so she tries to spice things up with Ted while contemplating a next step that could take her beyond Schitt’s Creek.

seasons.name: Season 6
seasons.overview: The Roses are achieving success in their careers and personal lives, forcing them all to contemplate their inevitable next steps.  But as their pursuits push them closer towards their long-awaited escape, the Roses see how connected their lives have become to the town and its residents. When they finally face the decision to stay or leave, it is much harder than expected.

episodes.name: Our Cup Runneth Over
episodes.overview: After losing their fortune, the Rose family must relocate to their last remaining asset - a small town Johnny once bought as a joke.

episodes.name: The Drip
episodes.overview: Johnny must get permission to sell the town from its Mayor, Roland Schitt. David and Alexis spend a night out with the locals.

episodes.name: Don't Worry, It's His Sister
episodes.overview: Johnny tries to get a potentially offensive town sign taken down, while David is faced with the frightening task of finding a job.

episodes.name: Bad Parents
episodes.overview: Johnny and Moira, feeling like they have failed as parents, try to get to know their grown children. Alexis spies on Mutt and thinks he's having an affair with the Mayor's wife.

episodes.name: The Cabin
episodes.overview: Looking for privacy, Johnny and Moira take the Mayor up on his offer of using his cabin for a night, while Alexis and David use the opportunity to throw a party.

episodes.name: Wine and Roses
episodes.overview: Moira is hired to be a local winery's spokesperson;  David struggles with a health problem.

episodes.name: Turkey Shoot
episodes.overview: Following an incident where David is unable to kill an insect in his room, Stevie, as a joke, invites David along on Roland's annual turkey shoot.

episodes.name: Allez Vous
episodes.overview: Moira and David try to earn money by selling cosmetics to the locals, while Johnny heads to Elmdale in hopes of collecting unemployment insurance.

episodes.name: Carl's Funeral
episodes.overview: Johnny reluctantly agrees to speak at the funeral of a local man he doesn’t really know. Alexis struggles with her new boyfriend’s love of animals.

episodes.name: Honeymoon
episodes.overview: Johnny and Moira attend Roland’s annual Hawaiian bash. Alexis and Ted throw a couple’s dinner party, while David and Stevie’s relationship heats up.

episodes.name: Little Sister
episodes.overview: Moira's estranged sister, Deedee, pays an unexpected visit, while David agrees to talk with one of Jocelyn's students about being "different".

episodes.name: Surprise Party
episodes.overview: Johnny tries to arrange a surprise birthday party for Moira. Things backfire when Moira, unwittingly, takes over the planning of her own party.

episodes.name: Town for Sale
episodes.overview: Johnny finds a potential buyer for the town, while David and Alexis discover they may have become more attached to Schitt’s Creek than they ever thought possible.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: When a filthy rich video store magnate Johnny Rose, his soap star wife Moira, and their two kids - über-hipster son David and socialite daughter Alexis - suddenly find themselves broke, they are forced to live in Schitt's Creek, a small, depressing town they once bought as a joke. With their pampered lives now abandoned, they must confront their new-found poverty and discover what it means to be a family, all within the rural city limits of their new home.

episodes.name: Finding David
episodes.overview: The Roses search for their missing son, David, while Alexis takes her relationship with Mutt to the next level despite technically being engaged to Ted.

episodes.name: Family Dinner
episodes.overview: Moira decides to cook dinner with the help of David. Johnny scopes out an office for his consulting business. And Alexis finally comes clean with Ted about their engagement.

episodes.name: Jazzagals
episodes.overview: Moira attempts to join the town’s a cappella group. Alexis enjoys the heady first days of her latest relationship. And Johnny helps out at Bob’s Garage despite himself.

episodes.name: Estate Sale
episodes.overview: Johnny and Moira go to an estate sale. Mutt surprises Alexis with a bike, while Roland asks David to help him shop for a special item.

episodes.name: Bob's Bagels
episodes.overview: Johnny talks himself into an unlikely business partnership with Bob. David gets an interview at a woman's clothing store, while Moira reluctantly cares for an ailing Alexis.

episodes.name: Moira vs. Town Council
episodes.overview: Moira tries to beautify the town. David misuses the company credit card. A grooming misstep forces Alexis and Mutt to question their relationship.

episodes.name: The Candidate
episodes.overview: Johnny considers running for town council. David and Stevie look for love. Alexis copes with being single.

episodes.name: Milk Money
episodes.overview: Johnny gets thrown into the raw milk business. Moira tries to connect with the townspeople. David gives style advice.

episodes.name: Moira's Nudes
episodes.overview: Moira is worried that racy photos from her past will jeopardize the campaign; Johnny asks for financial help; Alexis gets a job.

episodes.name: Ronnie’s Party
episodes.overview: Johnny and Moira meet with a key group of people, Alexis struggles with her new job, David offer's emotional support to his boss' daughter.

episodes.name: The Motel Guest
episodes.overview: Johnny and Moira have to deal with a surprise motel guest while Alexis and David go apartment hunting.

episodes.name: Lawn Signs
episodes.overview: Moira’s campaign takes a turn when some of her lawn signs mysteriously disappear. David and Alexis must work together to get David’s boss out of legal trouble.

episodes.name: Happy Anniversary
episodes.overview: Johnny and Moira go out for their anniversary and run into a couple they knew from their former life, while Alexis and David attend Mutt’s annual barn party, making up with some friends, and making out with others.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: After a failed attempt to sell the town, the once rich and powerful Rose family come to the depressing realization that their stay in Schitt's Creek may be longer than they originally hoped. Father and former video store magnate Johnny Rose continues to look for ways to extricate his family from life in their sad little town, while his wife Moira, a former soap star, searches for ways to grace the town with her sophistication and taste. As for their spoiled children, David and Alexis, they must do the unthinkable: find jobs. The Roses will bloom again -- even if it's in Schitt's Creek.

episodes.name: Opening Night
episodes.overview: Johnny struggles to find a new purpose, while Moira must confront the harsh realities of local politics.

episodes.name: The Throuple
episodes.overview: David and Stevie must come to terms with their new relationship, while Alexis and Moira become anxious when they schedule a rare mother/daughter lunch.

episodes.name: New Car
episodes.overview: Johnny and Moira try to get a deal on a used car while David helps Stevie put her great aunt to rest.

episodes.name: Driving Test
episodes.overview: Johnny and Moira worry about the future of the motel and David panics at the thought of retaking his driving test.

episodes.name: Rooms by the Hour
episodes.overview: Johnny puts the motel in jeopardy when he rents rooms to a dubious enterprise and David helps Moira with a film audition.

episodes.name: Murder Mystery
episodes.overview: Johnny and Stevie pitch a nearby golf course on a package deal with the motel. Moira tries to get out of an invitation to Twyla’s murder mystery party.

episodes.name: General Store
episodes.overview: David plans a new business venture, while Alexis adjusts to her first day at school.

episodes.name: Motel Review
episodes.overview: David meets a new friend while setting up his business, Johnny defends Alexis’s schoolwork, and Moira deals with a difficult guest at the motel.

episodes.name: The Affair
episodes.overview: Moira and Roland find themselves in a compromising situation. Alexis drives a wedge between David and Patrick.

episodes.name: Sebastien Raine
episodes.overview: David’s photographer ex-boyfriend arrives in town to do a photo series on Moira. Johnny and Roland suspect that Bob is cheating at poker.

episodes.name: Stop Saying Lice!
episodes.overview: Johnny tries to avoid the spread of lice in the motel. Moira tries to get out of having a flower garden named after her.

episodes.name: Friends and Family
episodes.overview: Johnny and Moira struggle to find a place for their family portrait. David hosts a 'soft launch' of his new store.

episodes.name: Grad Night
episodes.overview: Johnny and Stevie celebrate having a fully booked hotel; David and Patrick go on a date.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: As Season Three gets underway, the Rose family continues to ingratiate themselves into everyday life in Schitt’s Creek. Johnny has hit a brick wall in his quest to get the Roses out of Schitt’s Creek, and struggles to find a new project to give his life purpose – that is, until he finds one right under his nose. Moira adjusts to her new position on Town Council, learning the hard way that big ideas aren’t always compatible with small-town realities. David is riding high after meeting a new love interest at a party, but soon discovers that his romantic life is becoming entangled with Stevie’s. Meanwhile, Alexis contemplates her future, and decides to go back to school to complete her education. The Roses continue to adapt to everyday life in Schitt’s Creek, as their temporary sojourn begins to look more and more permanent with each passing day.

episodes.name: Dead Guy in Room 4
episodes.overview: While Moira fears she is responsible for the death of a motel guest, David and Patrick decide to make their budding romance official.

episodes.name: Pregnancy Test
episodes.overview: Johnny braces himself for the possibility of another baby in the family after finding a positive pregnancy test and David and Patrick search for privacy.

episodes.name: Asbestos Fest
episodes.overview: Moira prepares for her headline debut at the annual Schitt's Creek Asbestos Fest, while David deals with a group of loitering teens in the apothecary.

episodes.name: Girls' Night
episodes.overview: Alexis and Twyla have a girls' night out and Patrick teaches David about compromise.

episodes.name: RIP Moira Rose
episodes.overview: A rumor of Moira's death appears online and Roland asks Johnny to be his child's godfather.

episodes.name: Open Mic
episodes.overview: David and Patrick host an open mic night; Johnny and Stevie start rebranding the hotel.

episodes.name: The Barbecue
episodes.overview: David and Moira hold a party for Patrick, but David worries about how his family would adversely affect Patrick. Alexis investigates with help a mysterious text from Ted.

episodes.name: The Jazzaguy
episodes.overview: After the barbecue fiasco, Stevie takes David to a spa for some consoling, but she bought a honeymoon package making things worse. Johnny impresses the Jazzagals with his talents, but Moira doesn't like his joining the group. Alexis tries out a dating app and dates a cute local.

episodes.name: The Olive Branch
episodes.overview: David tries to reconcile with Patrick. Moira pitches a singles event at Town Hall while Johnny buys Stevie a gift for her help at the motel.

episodes.name: Baby Sprinkle
episodes.overview: For research, Johnny and Moira attend a singles event but get too involved. Alexis runs into an old friend, David agrees to help Jocelyn in planning her baby shower.

episodes.name: The Rollout
episodes.overview: Moira tries to avoid jury duty and David issues a recall on a Rose Apothecary product that causes rashes.

episodes.name: Singles Week
episodes.overview: Singles Week gets underway just as Jocelyn’s baby arrives, and Patrick takes his relationship with David to the next level.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: As season four begins, the Roses are making the most of life in Schitt’s Creek, and —Moira’s constant talk of escaping aside— are finally starting to feel at home in the town. Johnny is busy running the motel with Stevie as his partner. Business is booming, but it’s a challenge for him to balance work and family, while dealing with Roland’s antics. Moira is carrying out her duties with Town Council and the Jazzagals, and is also looking for new ways to utilize her talents, whether it’s through a theatrical performance, or by helping Alexis navigate event planning. David is managing his store and attempting to maintain a brand new relationship, but between struggling to find the time for romance, and overcoming the anxieties of his dating past, this is proving to be a challenge. Meanwhile, Alexis is putting all of her energy into school and her career, but is finding it difficult to focus when she still has lingering feelings for her ex-fiancé, Ted.

episodes.name: The Crowening
episodes.overview: While Moira is in Bosnia filming the Crows movie that she hopes will revive her acting career, David attempts to take his relationship with Patrick to new heights.

episodes.name: Love Letters
episodes.overview: A sleep-deprived Moira worries about a stack of old love letters addressed to Johnny from another woman, while David and Stevie are held up at David's store.

episodes.name: The Plant
episodes.overview: Alexis and Johnny hatch a plan to impress a motel reviewer, while David and Patrick search for a new apartment.

episodes.name: The Dress
episodes.overview: Johnny finds himself under financial pressure with the arrival of Moira’s high-priced red carpet gown for the Crows movie premiere. David is conned into taking a road trip with Stevie.

episodes.name: Housewarming
episodes.overview: David and Patrick throw a housewarming party and Ted finally lets loose, while Johnny and Moira try their best to babysit Roland Jr. for the evening.

episodes.name: Rock On!
episodes.overview: Moira and the Jazzagals take Jocelyn out for a night at the casino, while Johnny tries to navigate an awkward conversation with Stevie about intimacy in the workplace.

episodes.name: A Whisper of Desire
episodes.overview: Johnny suspects that Ted’s mom is attracted to him, while Moira can’t resist getting involved in a local musical production.

episodes.name: The Hospies
episodes.overview: Johnny and Stevie attend the regional hospitality awards, while Moira does everything in her power to stop Alexis from auditioning for Cabaret.

episodes.name: The M.V.P.
episodes.overview: David agrees to sub in for the annual baseball game, and Moira runs a rehearsal that pushes Stevie over the edge.

episodes.name: Roadkill
episodes.overview: Johnny and Moira’s afternoon plans are interrupted when they accidentally hit a cat. David runs into an old colleague at the flea market whose new business bears a striking resemblance to Rose Apothecary.

episodes.name: Meet the Parents
episodes.overview: Patrick’s parents are in town for his surprise party, but the parents end up with an even bigger surprise, while Alexis drags Moira to a soap opera convention.

episodes.name: The Roast
episodes.overview: Johnny fills in for Moira at the annual Mayor’s Roast, as David distracts Moira from finding out that Stevie and Patrick have been taking private dance lessons.

episodes.name: The Hike
episodes.overview: Patrick tries to take David on a romantic hike, while Johnny has a health scare that sends everyone into a panic.

episodes.name: Life Is a Cabaret
episodes.overview: It’s Opening Night for Cabaret,and Stevie is nowhere to be found. David tries to make a big announcement, but keeps getting overshadowed by the musical.

5.name: Season 5
5.overview: The Roses are finally thriving in Schitt’s Creek and find themselves ready to take their personal relationships and business pursuits to the next level. Moira returns from a breakthrough film shoot in Bosnia with a clear exit strategy and a renewed sense of purpose, and with that newfound energy, she is inspired to leave her mark on the town by launching her most ambitious artistic endeavor yet. Meanwhile, the reputation of the Rosebud Motel is steadily building under Johnny’s leadership, but managing the individual needs of his staff, Stevie and Roland, proves to be a greater challenge. With Rose Apothecary running smoothly, David is now focusing on nurturing his relationship with Patrick, and from apartment hunting to joining a baseball team, he proves he’s willing to go the extra mile. Alexis, having finally achieved some stability in both romance and career, isn’t one to let things get stale, so she tries to spice things up with Ted while contemplating a next step that could take her beyond Schitt’s Creek.

episodes.name: Smoke Signals
episodes.overview: David scouts a potential wedding venue, while Johnny and Moira have a romantic picnic by the creek.

episodes.name: The Incident
episodes.overview: David is embarrassed by a childhood issue that resurfaces, and only spirals further when Patrick is so understanding. Johnny, Stevie and Roland attend a viewing for a nearby motel. Alexis helps Moira join social media.

episodes.name: The Job Interview
episodes.overview: Johnny and Moira endeavor to secure an investor for a new motel while Alexis and Ted struggle with long-distance.

episodes.name: Maid of Honour
episodes.overview: Moira shares the newly released “Crows” movie trailer with the Jazzagals. Johnny and Roland find a suspicious bag of money at the new motel.

episodes.name: The Premiere
episodes.overview: Alexis plans a local premiere for the "Crows" movie, and Moira makes a big splash on the red carpet. David tends to Patrick after his wisdom teeth removal.

episodes.name: The Wingman
episodes.overview: Alexis and Moira deal with the aftermath of a viral video, while Johnny helps Bob get back out in the dating world.

episodes.name: Moira Rosé
episodes.overview: Moira and David sample wine at Herb Ertlinger's vineyard, while Johnny attempts to have “the talk” with Patrick.

episodes.name: The Presidential Suite
episodes.overview: Johnny and Moira spend a night at the presidential suite in the new motel, while Alexis receives a surprise visitor.

episodes.name: Rebound
episodes.overview: Johnny becomes overly involved in Alexis' romantic life, while Moira offends the townspeople in an interview with People magazine.

episodes.name: Sunrise, Sunset
episodes.overview: Moira’s former "Sunrise Bay" producers show up with big news, while Alexis binge-watches old episodes of the soap and discovers some dirt.

episodes.name: The Bachelor Party
episodes.overview: The Roses attend the Escape Room portion of David and Patrick's Bachelor Party, but their participation wanes the more their personal dilemmas come to a head.

episodes.name: The Pitch
episodes.overview: Johnny, Stevie and Roland head to New York for their pitch meeting, while the family anxiously awaits their return.

episodes.name: Start Spreading the News
episodes.overview: Moira receives some unexpected news, and David makes a tough decision about where he wants to live.

episodes.name: Happy Ending
episodes.overview: David stresses out over the rain on his wedding day, the family scrambles to make it right.

6.name: Season 6
6.overview: The Roses are achieving success in their careers and personal lives, forcing them all to contemplate their inevitable next steps.  But as their pursuits push them closer towards their long-awaited escape, the Roses see how connected their lives have become to the town and its residents. When they finally face the decision to stay or leave, it is much harder than expected.
